name: MERR 85B
title: Merrill Classroom Connection Field Study
description: Supervised hands-on experience assisting in local K-12 school classrooms. Students attend UCSC class meetings, complete relevant readings in educational theory, and present a final assignment. This course requires more hours than MERR 85C and involves travel to Pescadero twice per week. May be repeated for credit.

pre_req_data.text: Priority enrollment restricted to Merrill College members.

class_notes: Taught in conjunction with MERR 85C please see the Merrill website for class details . Non- Affiliated students emailclassroomconnection@ucsc.eduand attend first class meeting.
